downloadTitle: Video: Using ASP.NET Routing with Web Forms
downloadDescription: This video shows how to use ASP.NET routing to handle URL requests that do not map to a physical file in a Web application.  See Related Resources for documentation and for a code example that accompanies this video.
detailsSection: ASP.NET routing is enabled in ASP.NET applications that use Dynamic Data or the MVC framework. However, routing is not enabled in ASP.NET Web site projects. This video shows how to enable routing in an ASP.NET Web site. The steps include changing the configuration file, creating a custom route handler, and defining routes.
installInstructionSection: • Click the Download button on this page to start the video.

relatedResourcesSection.title: how to: Use Routing with Web Forms
